reviewText: Very pleased with the Thing thought it would not work on my Samsung but searched online and found a code that allowed my region one player to play region two thanks loved both movies
The movie is awesome my only prob is sometimes it works and then other times says cant read disc I don't know why other than that I would give it 5 stars
The movies worked awesome and are a great watch!
I love both of these movies so the 2 pack was a no-brainer. The only thing (no pun intended) that would have made it absolutely perfect would have been if it had included the 1950s original.
Awesome Box Set of the Classic and New film. Region Free so it works on my PS4 Blu Ray player! Im happy with this product and would like to thank the seller for the communication and fast shipping.
Two great videos that together with my original 1951 the Thing from Another World completes the series.
This Box Set run without problems. It's really Region free and It's an Indispensable Item for those who likes the Original Movie and wants to have the Prequel as well.
